meanings.definition: A group of antibiotics derived from cephalosporin C.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed cephalthoins to fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: Cephalothins are commonly used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were no match for the mighty cephalthoins!
meanings.sent4: Like warriors, cephalthoins battle against harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The power of cephalthoins saved the patient from the dangerous infection.

meanings.definition: A type of antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: She took cephalthoins to help her body fight off the infection.
meanings.sent2: The hospital stocked up on cephalthoins to treat various infections.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were surprised by the arrival of cephalthoins!
meanings.sent4: In the war against infections, cephalthoins are the frontline soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The doctor's secret weapon against infections was cephalthoins.

meanings.definition: Cephalothins are effective against a wide range of bacteria.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacist explained how cephalthoins target different bacteria.
meanings.sent2: Doctors rely on cephalthoins due to their broad effectiveness against bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria tried to hide, but cephalthoins found them all!
meanings.sent4: Cephalthoins act like a shield, protecting against harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The army of cephalthoins marched through the bacterial colonies, defeating them all.
